attributes.action: get Brigitte Bardot to replace him, today, as Prime Minister of England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: McBroon has proved that it is possible to evade election and merely appoint somebody as the Prime Minister of this country.  Ms Bardot has recently demonstrated that she has the moral fortitude to speak out against what is bad in her own country, where she is being vilified for it.  We need her in this country so that she can put right what eleven years of consummate political corrujption has destroyed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
